thread.title: Energy quotes weigh on euro area factory gate prices in July
thread.title_full: Energy quotes weigh on euro area factory gate prices in July

title: Energy quotes weigh on euro area factory gate prices in July
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Sep 2, 2015, 11:48 BST - UK Markets close in 4 hrs 42 mins Energy quotes weigh on euro area factory gate prices in July By Alexander Bueso | Sharecast – 12 minutes ago Print 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Factory gate prices in the single currency area fell in July, weighed down by lower energy quotes. An index of producer prices in the euro area slipped by 2.1% year-on-year during the reference period, as expected by economists. 
In comparison with the prior month, prices were down by one tenth of a percentage point. 
By chapters, and in terms of month-on-month rates of change, intermediate goods prices were unchanged, while those for capital goods, durable consumer goods and non-durable consumer goods all increased by 0.1%. 
At the country level, producer prices in Germany were unchanged when compared to the month before and slipped by 0.1% in France, although in Spain they increased by 0.1%. 
In the UK, prices dropped by 0.6% over the month. Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
